ygData.subject: Re: Bard Base Stat Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: Stop with this bandwidth b.s. - the internet is made out of huge bandwidth. Even 200 emails on bard stats is not gonna make your modem light blink. Boring to
ygData.messageBody:
Stop with this bandwidth b.s. - the internet is made out of huge bandwidth.
Even 200 emails on bard stats is not gonna make your modem light blink.

Boring to you is another issue - but dont say bandwidth when you mean
boring. Delete or filter stuff you dont wanna read. (hehe you can prolly
"killfile" me and save half your "bandwidth" <g>)

There is valuable info for young bards here -- when you are young is the
time to know how you compare. For example, with my lowly 75 in str - I CANT
carry a full set of bronze. If you wanna be a bard and wear plate and wear
bronze plate, then you better have alot of str. I got lots of str booster
and am bearly able to walk around with a minimal amount of stuff and all the
visible bronze pieces except boots - cant wear with being encumbered from
the git go.

Sylly

So, if there are young bards out there who want plate, then they need to
know - cuz a restart at level 5 is LOTS better than a restart at level 15.





-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman <slide@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, August 01, 1999 11:22 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Base Stat Survey


>From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <slide@...>
>
>People - PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE respond via private email to this survey. I
>am sure the majority of us - while perhaps interested in the results of the
>survey - aren't interested in the raw data. I am guessing there are
>something like 250+ people on this list (no clue - just a guess) - making
>250 people see your stats is a big waste of bandwidth..
>
>Thanks
>
>Slyde
>
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
